New Records: Sunil Chhetri became the 8th player in the world and the first Indian footballer to play 150 or more international matches.
Sunil Chhetri scored the only goal for India, his 94th international goal.
Key Match Events: India lost to Afghanistan 2-1 in the FIFA World Cup 2026 Qualifier.
Pre-Game Insights: The match was played at the Indira Gandhi Athletic Stadium in Guwahati, Assam.
Post-Match Reflections: India's defeat against Afghanistan has diminished its chances of qualifying for a place in the third round of the FIFA World Cup 2026.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Sunil Chhetri's 150th international match was against Afghanistan.
